explains: v. 放屁；（在愚蠢、琐碎事情上）浪费时间，瞎折腾（fart about/around）
n. 放屁；讨厌鬼，老顽固

sentences.en: Today, in the math class, I had the urge to fart.
sentences.cn: 今天的数学课上，我有想放屁的冲动。

sentences.en: Animals produce methane, which is another dangerous greenhouse gas when they burp and fart.
sentences.cn: 动物打嗝、放屁时会产生另一种危险的温室气体甲烷。

sentences.en: Every night he listens to my troubles, cooing his understanding or praising me with an encouraging fart.
sentences.cn: 每个晚上他都聆听我的烦恼，或是咕嘟着表示他懂，或是放一个响屁来以表鼓励。
